nodes.text: Operating along similar principles to a blaster's stun setting, shock pulse emitters possessed a shorter effective range, which made them of little use alone. However, when integrated into weapons, shock pulse emitters became effective tools for debilitating opponents. When striking an opponent, shock pulse weapons were able to wear them down, causing exhaustion and confusion, therefore making it easier to land a finishing blow.
The shock pulse emitter was mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
